greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient of s(y) in p(|y|), where s is Schur functions, p is power-sum symmetric functions, y is the integer partition with Heinz number n, and |y| = Sum y_i.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = (-1)^(A056239(n) - A061395(n)) if n belongs to A093641 (Heinz numbers of hooks), 0 otherwise.
program: A056239(n) = { my(f); if(1==n, 0, f=factor(n); sum(i=1, #f~, f[i,2] * primepi(f[i,1]))); }
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 14 2018
